name: Popup Dungeon
summary: A tactical roguelike RPG inspired by our favorite tabletop games that lets you create any ability, item, villain, hero, and game imaginable.
info:
• 发行: Humble Games
  • 别名: 弹出地牢
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: roguelike RPG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2020-08-12
  • 官方网站: http://www.popupdungeon.com/
  • 开发: Triple.B.Titles
